interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: LumaRx Facial Cleansing Brush with 1-Minute Pulsing Timer and LED Speed Indicator Light, Rechargeable and Showerproof, White/Silver Review Date: 2016/03/02 Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Material': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'LumaRx', 'Color': 'White/Silver', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '074590543216', 'Manufacturer': 'LumaRx'} Review Text: Fantastic facial cleaning brush. I like that it has a pretty case to use if I ever travel with it. You can store the other brushes (comes with 3. One for massage, one for sensitive skin and one normal brush)
Great that the battery holds a charge for about 30 uses. Nice feature for when I'm on the road and don't want to bother with the charger at every hotel.
Has 3 speeds so you can decide on how much brushing you want on your face.
My face feels so clean after I'm done using it. I put on some night cream, with the massage brush, afterwards and my face is so smooth. I love it.
I'm also wondering how difficult it will be to find replacement brush heads. Review Title: Quick and easy facial cleaning in no time Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Pantene Pro-V Damage Detox Rebuilding Conditioner 24 fl oz Pantene {'Brand': 'Pantene', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Frizzy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '24 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4 x 2.8 inches; 1.77 Pounds', 'UPC': '080878177301', 'Manufacturer': 'Pantene'} It does make my hair soft but, I can't take the minty smell it has! I use Pantene products all the time and was shocked when I was in the shower and put this conditioner on my head. I stopped and looked at the bottle to see what exactly I was using. Doesn't smell nice like the other Pantene Conditioners I've used. Going to have to put this bottle under my cabinet to use only when I'm desperate. Will go back to the other Pantene conditioners. And I will always open and smell any new shampoo or conditioner I buy. Don't like minty smell. LumaRx Facial Cleansing Brush with 1-Minute Pulsing Timer and LED Speed Indicator Light, Rechargeable and Showerproof, White/Silver {'Material': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'LumaRx', 'Color': 'White/Silver', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '074590543216', 'Manufacturer': 'LumaRx'} Fantastic facial cleaning brush. I like that it has a pretty case to use if I ever travel with it. You can store the other brushes (comes with 3. One for massage, one for sensitive skin and one normal brush)
Great that the battery holds a charge for about 30 uses. Nice feature for when I'm on the road and don't want to bother with the charger at every hotel.
Has 3 speeds so you can decide on how much brushing you want on your face.
My face feels so clean after I'm done using it. I put on some night cream, with the massage brush, afterwards and my face is so smooth. I love it.
I'm also wondering how difficult it will be to find replacement brush heads. Quick and easy facial cleaning in no time
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Loyalty:** Strong preference for Pantene products, indicating a high level of brand loyalty, particularly in hair care.
- **Hair Care Needs:** Focus on products for damaged and frizzy hair, reflecting a need for restorative solutions.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Highly sensitive to scents; prefers pleasant fragrances and reacts negatively to minty smells.
- **Product Evaluation:** Evaluates hair care products based on sensory experience, particularly scent, alongside functionality (softness of hair). Shows a similar pattern in evaluating skincare products, emphasizing practicality and effectiveness.
- **Purchasing Behavior:** Willing to try new products but tends to revert to familiar ones if the new option is unsatisfactory. Recent interaction indicates openness to exploring skincare tools that enhance facial cleansing.
- **Review Patterns:** Engages with products by providing detailed reviews, highlighting both pros and cons based on personal experience. Recent feedback emphasizes features such as usability and effectiveness, along with consideration for traveling convenience.

This summary reflects a user who values effectiveness and practicality in both hair and skincare while being particular about fragrance, showcasing a balance between brand loyalty and selectivity in product experiences.
